import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect'; import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import './checkout.styles.scss'; const CheckoutPage = () => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
TOTAL: ${total}
); const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage);
